sqlMap.select: SELECT A.USERID,A.EMPNAME, C.ORGNAME,C.ORGID FROM OM_EMPLOYEE A, OM_EMPORG B, OM_ORGANIZATION C WHERE A.EMPID = B.EMPID AND B.ORGID = C.ORGID AND B.ISMAIN = 'y' AND A.EMPNAME = #username# ORDER BY C.ORGCODE
SELECT COUNT(A.OPERATORID) NUM FROM AC_OPERATOR A WHERE A.USERID = #userid# AND A.PASSWORD =#password#

select a.EMPID, a.USERID, a.OPERATORNAME, a.OPERATORID, a.EMAIL, c.orgid, c.orgcode, c.orgname, c.jgsx, c.orgdegree, c.orgysjgid, c.orgtype, c.orgseq, c.ysjgbh， a.headpicicon, a.password, xb.MOBILENO from ac_operator a, om_emporg b, om_organization c, ABF_T_YGFJXXB XB where a.operatorid = b.empid and b.orgid = c.orgid and xb.empid(+)=a.operatorid and a.userid = #userid# and c.orgid=#orgid#

select orgid,orgcode,orgname from ( select parentorgid from om_organization where orgtype in ('3','4') start with orgid = #orgid# connect by prior parentorgid = orgid ) parent,om_organization omorg where parent.parentorgid = omorg.orgid
select orgid,orgcode,orgname from om_organization where orgcode=#ysjgbh#
select a.* from ac_role a ,ac_operatorrole b where a.roleid=b.roleid and operatorid=#operatorid#

select * from ( select distinct to_char(ac_funcgroup.funcgroupid) funccode,ac_funcgroup.funcgroupname funcname,'' funcaction,'' parainfo,ac_funcgroup.grouplevel,'n' isleaf,ac_funcgroup.displayorder from ac_funcgroup where ac_funcgroup.grouplevel =1 and ac_funcgroup.parentgroup is null and ac_funcgroup.appid = 121 START WITH funcgroupid in ((select ac_funcgroup.funcgroupid from AC_ROLEFUNC,ac_funcgroup,ac_function where ROLEID IN
#roles[]#
and AC_ROLEFUNC.type = 0 and ac_function.funccode = AC_ROLEFUNC.FUNCCODE and ac_function.ismenu = 'y' and ac_rolefunc.funcgroupid = ac_funcgroup.funcgroupid and ac_funcgroup.appid = 121) union (select funcgroupid from ac_rolefunclock where roleid in
#roles[]#
and ac_rolefunclock.islock =1 and ac_rolefunclock.appid=121) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR parentgroup = funcgroupid ) order by displayorder

select * from ( (select distinct to_char(ac_funcgroup.funcgroupid) funccode,ac_funcgroup.funcgroupname funcname,'' funcaction,'' parainfo,ac_funcgroup.grouplevel,'n' isleaf,ac_funcgroup.displayorder, AC_FUNCGROUP.GROUPICON FUNICON from ac_funcgroup where ac_funcgroup.grouplevel =#grouplevel# and ac_funcgroup.parentgroup =#parentgroup# and ac_funcgroup.appid = 121 START WITH funcgroupid in ((select ac_funcgroup.funcgroupid from AC_ROLEFUNC,ac_funcgroup,ac_function where ROLEID IN
#roles[]#
and AC_ROLEFUNC.type = 0 and ac_function.funccode = AC_ROLEFUNC.FUNCCODE and ac_function.ismenu = 'y' and ac_rolefunc.funcgroupid = ac_funcgroup.funcgroupid and AC_ROLEFUNC.appid = ac_funcgroup.appid and ac_funcgroup.appid = 121 ) union (select funcgroupid from ac_rolefunclock where roleid in
#roles[]#
and ac_rolefunclock.islock =1 and ac_funcgroup.appid = 121 ) ) CONNECT BY PRIOR parentgroup = funcgroupid ) ) union ( (select ac_function.funccode,ac_function.funcname,ac_function.funcaction,ac_function.parainfo,0 as grouplevel,'y' isleaf,ac_function.displayorder,AC_FUNCTION.FUNICON from ac_function, AC_ROLEFUNC where ROLEID IN
#roles[]#
and AC_ROLEFUNC.type = 0 and ac_function.funccode = AC_ROLEFUNC.Funccode and ac_function.funcgroupid = #parentgroup# and ac_function.ismenu = 'y' and AC_ROLEFUNC.appid=121 ) union (select ac_function.funccode, ac_function.funcname, ac_function.funcaction, ac_function.parainfo, 0 as grouplevel, 'y' isleaf, ac_function.displayorder, AC_FUNCTION.FUNICON from ac_function,ac_rolefunclock where ac_rolefunclock.funcgroupid =ac_function.funcgroupid and ac_rolefunclock.roleid in
#roles[]#
and ac_rolefunclock.funcgroupid = #parentgroup# and ac_rolefunclock.islock =1 and ac_function.ismenu = 'y' and ac_rolefunclock.appid=121 ) ) order by displayorder
SELECT A.ORGID, A.ORGNAME FROM OM_ORGANIZATION A, OM_EMPORG B WHERE A.ORGID = B.ORGID AND B.EMPID = #empid# AND A.STATUS = 'running' ORDER BY A.ORGCODE
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T_SYS_LOGINLOG (RECID, USERID, EMPNAME, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_TIME, LOGIN_FLAG) VALUES (T_SYS_LOGINLOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #userId#, #empName#, #loginIp#, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyyMMddHH24mmss'), '00')
sqlMap.select: select groupids.GROUPID from (select distinct GROUPID from (select om_organization.orgseq, om_grouprange.groupid from om_grouprange, om_organization where om_grouprange.grangeid = om_organization.orgid and Flag = 2) groupm, (select om_organization.orgseq from om_employee, om_emporg, om_organization where om_employee.empid = #empid:VARCHAR# and om_employee.empid = om_emporg.empid and om_emporg.orgid = om_organization.orgid) emporg where emporg.orgseq like groupm.orgseq ||'%' union select GROUPID from om_group where empid = #empid:VARCHAR# and grouptype = 'personal' and groupstatus = 'run' union select OM_GROUPRANGE.Groupid from OM_GROUPRANGE, ac_operatorrole where OM_GROUPRANGE.Flag = 3 and OM_GROUPRANGE.Grangeid = ac_operatorrole.roleid and ac_operatorrole.operatorid =#empid:VARCHAR# union select groupid from OM_GROUPRANGE where Flag = 1 and grangeid = #empid:VARCHAR#) groupids, om_group where groupids.groupid = om_group.groupid and om_group.groupstatus = 'run'
select t2.positionid, t2.posicode, t2.posiname from om_empposition t1, om_position t2 where t1.positionid = t2.positionid and t1.empid = #empid#
